title: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman flags anonymity as 'inherent risk' in use of blockchain - Economic Times
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman flags anonymity as 'inherent risk' in use of blockchain  Economic Times
description: Sitharaman said the distributed ledger technology is a beautiful technology which will help in democratisation but flagged anonymity as an "inherent risk" which we need to guard ourselves from.
